name: Rudolf Steiner
main_interests: Metaphysics, epistemology, philosophy of science, esotericism, Christianity
influences: Franz Brentano, Fichte, Goethe, Eduard von Hartmann, Hegel, Immanuel Kant
influenced: Owen Barfield, Saul Bellow, Andrej Belyj, Josef Beuys, Martin Buber,   Wassily Kandinsky, Edouard Schuré, Albert Schweitzer, Richard Tarnas,
notable_ideas: Anthroposophy, Anthroposophical Medicine, Biodynamic Agriculture, Eurythmy, Spiritual Science, Waldorf Education, holism, Holism in science
